plot: Elke Opitz meets her former classmate Julia Backhoff, who works at a hostess service. When Lilo Gottschick, Julia's boss, arrives, she prophesies to Elke that she will also start with her in less than two weeks; Vera Richter sprained her ankle while jogging. Peter, who has made himself useful in the garden, massages the damaged area. Between the two it crackles tremendously. Vera, however, wants Peter to move out again.
